item.title: K2HAX Field Day 2017
item.description: K2HAX 2017 Field Day Notice Interlock HAM radio station K2HAX will be participating in the ARRL Field Day event. We will be doing it in Palmyra. A 2600 attendee (@pee) has offered to let us use land. We are going to doing it purely off grid with generators, solar, and …
item.dc:creator: JustBill

item.title: Interlock Wireless Upgrades
item.description: Often as time goes the team that runs Interlock IT infrastructure needs to make updates and upgrades to our systems.   This has happened recently with the upgraded wireless infrastructure right here at Interlock.  While this was done about a month back, full production cut over happened earlier this week.  We …
item.dc:creator: justbill
